overview: Almost 7 Hours Of Hardcore Entertainment! Who said that the outfit doesn't make the fantasy? Dive into this collection from Marc Dorcel and meet again those who made you dream in their suits. The secretaries, the soldiers, the air hostesses, the dominating and submissive ones, the cops, the married women, without forgetting the most exiting of all, the maid. Uniforms have always stimulated men's desires.
title: Uniformes Deluxe Anthology
